aspectran.description: |{{underline}}Commands that can run examples:{{underline:off}} | {{CYAN}}hello{{fg:off}} Runs the helloWorld() method of the sampleAction bean and prints the returned value | {{CYAN}}hello2{{fg:off}} Runs the helloWorld() method of the sampleAction bean and prints the returned value with margins | {{CYAN}}echo{{fg:off}} It accepts parameters and print as is | {{CYAN}}echo2{{fg:off}} It accepts parameters and attributes, and print them as is | {{CYAN}}login{{fg:off}} It accepts parameters used for login and print them | {{CYAN}}chpw{{fg:off}} It accepts parameters for changing the password and print them | |{{underline}}To control Jetty, try one of the following commands:{{underline:off}} | {{MAGENTA}}jetty{{fg:off}} Displays commands required to control Jetty server | {{MAGENTA}}jetty start{{fg:off}} Runs a Jetty server | {{MAGENTA}}jetty stop{{fg:off}} Stops the currently running Jetty server | |{{underline}}Once a Jetty server is running, point your web browser to:{{underline:off}} | {{YELLOW}}http://localhost:8080/{{fg:off}} |
